text: José Méndez (9 May 1937 - January 2021) was a Spanish rower. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born in Pontevedra, Spain. Mendez died in January 2021, aged 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Spain Category:Rowers
title: José Méndez (rower)
